title: Failboat

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**The Idea is simple!**: Create a "simple" idea for the next day, making a temporary rule. This must be approved by the host.
**The Idea is NOT SIMPLE**: Once per game, activate every previously created rule at once tomorrow

*Well good morning, good night, or good afternoon everyone, depending on your time zone!*
